snippet: Three associates of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi were sentenced to jail terms of five to seven years on Friday for aiding and abetting prostitution.
abstract: Emilio Fede, Lele Mora and Nicole Minetti, associates of former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi, are sentenced to jail terms of five to seven years for aiding and abetting prostitution by procuring young women for paid sex with Berlusconi.
lead_paragraph: Three associates of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi were sentenced to jail terms of five to seven years on Friday for aiding and abetting prostitution.
